column5: The world of international business is constantly changing. This Masters degree programme will put you at the cutting edge of industry, providing the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in the modern global market.This programme is accredited by the United Arab Emirates Ministry of EducationYou need to be at the cutting edge of industry to be able to respond to changes in the international business world. The global pandemic has transformed traditional business models and accelerated the use of technology. This Masters degree programme will arm you with the flexible skills required to succeed in the modern global market.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
